values.authorQuote: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
values.author: Maya Angelou

values.authorQuote: It is impossible to struggle for civil rights, equal rights for blacks, without including whites. Because equal rights, fair play, justice, are all like the air: we all have it, or none of us has it. That is the truth of it.
values.author: Maya Angelou

values.authorQuote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues, because without courage you can't practice any other virtue consistently. You can practice any virtue erratically, but nothing consistently without courage.
values.author: Maya Angelou

values.authorQuote: I'm grateful to intelligent people. That doesn't mean educated. That doesn't mean intellectual. I mean really intelligent. What black old people used to call 'mother wit' means intelligence that you had in your mother's womb. That's what you rely on. You know what's right to do.
values.author: Maya Angelou

values.authorQuote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of making a mistake.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: Do exactly what you would do if you felt most secure.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: He who would be serene and pure needs but one thing, detachment.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: God is at home, it's we who have gone out for a walk.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: All God wants of man is a peaceful heart.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: God expects but one thing of you, and that is that you should come out of yourself in so far as you are a created being made and let God be God in you.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: The outward work will never be puny if the inward work is great.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: What a man takes in by contemplation, that he pours out in love.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: The eye with which I see God is the same eye with which God sees me.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: The knower and the known are one. Simple people imagine that they should see God as if he stood there and they here. This is not so. God and I, we are one in knowledge.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: To be full of things is to be empty of God. To be empty of things is to be full of God.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: When you are thwarted, it is your own attitude that is out of order.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: Man goes far away or near but God never goes far-off; he is always standing close at hand, and even if he cannot stay within he goes no further than the door.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: Words derive their power from the original word.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: A just person is one who is conformed and transformed into justice.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: We are celebrating the feast of the Eternal Birth which God the Father has borne and never ceases to bear in all eternity... But if it takes not place in me, what avails it? Everything lies in this, that it should take place in me.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: A human being has so many skins inside, covering the depths of the heart. We know so many things, but we don't know ourselves! Why, thirty or forty skins or hides, as thick and hard as an ox's or bear's, cover the soul. Go into your own ground and learn to know yourself there.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: There exists only the present instant... a Now which always and without end is itself new. There is no yesterday nor any tomorrow, but only Now, as it was a thousand years ago and as it will be a thousand years hence.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: Truly, it is in darkness that one finds the light, so when we are in sorrow, then this light is nearest of all to us.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: Every creature is a word of God.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: The more we have the less we own.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: If God gave the soul his whole creation she would not be filled thereby but only with himself.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: Only the hand that erases can write the true thing.
values.author: Meister Eckhart

values.authorQuote: My mother's wonderful. To me she's perfection.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I'm happy to be alive, I'm happy to be who I am.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: The meaning of life is contained in every single expression of life. It is present in the infinity of forms and phenomena that exist in all of creation.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: But I will never stop helping and loving people the way Jesus said to.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I don't understand why the press is so interested in speculating about my appearance, anyway. What does my face have to do with my music or my dancing?
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I'm just like anyone. I cut and I bleed. And I embarass easily.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I rememeber one time we were getting ready to go to South America and everything was packed up and in the car ready to go and I hid and I was crying because I really did not want to go, I wanted to play. I did not want to go.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Because I wanted to have a place that I could create everything that I that I never had as a child. So, you see rides. You see animals. There's a movie theater.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I'm never pleased with anything, I'm a perfectionist, it's part of who I am.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: They did it to try and belittle me, to try and to take away my pride. But I went through the whole system with them. And at the end, I - I wanted the public to know that I was okay, even though I was hurting.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Yes, and I had pimples so badly it used to make me so shy. I used not to look at myself. I'd hide my face in the dark, I wouldn't want to look in the mirror and my father teased me and I just hated it and I cried everyday.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Because parents have power over children. They feel they have to do what their parents say. But the love of money is the root of all evil. And this is a sweet child. And to see him turn like this, this isn't him. This is not him.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I'm a black American, I am proud of my race. I am proud of who I am. I have a lot of pride and dignity.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I love my family very much. I wish I could see them a little more often than I do. But we understand because we're a show business family and we all work.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Children show me in their playful smiles the divine in everyone. This simple goodness shines straight from their hearts and only asks to be loved.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I just wish I could understand my father.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Please keep an open mind and let me have my day in court.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Everything that I love is behind those gates. We have elephants, and giraffes, and crocodiles, and every kind of tigers and lions. And - and we have bus loads of kids, who don't get to see those things. They come up sick children, and enjoy it.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Why can't you share your bed? The most loving thing to do is to share your bed with someone. It's very charming. It's very sweet. It's what the whole world should do.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: It's a complete lie, why do people buy these papers? It's not the truth I'm here to say. You know, don't judge a person, do not pass judgement, unless you have talked to them one on one. I don't care what the story is, do not judge them because it is a lie.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: When I see children, I see the face of God. That's why I love them so much. That's what I see.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: Just because it's in print doesn't mean it's the gospel.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: People write negatives things, cause they feel that's what sells. Good news to them, doesn't sell.
values.author: Michael Jackson

values.authorQuote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: If you're trying to achieve, there will be roadblocks. I've had them; everybody has had them. But obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: My father used to say that it's never too late to do anything you wanted to do. And he said, 'You never know what you can accomplish until you try.'
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: The game has its ups and downs, but you can never lose focus of your individual goals and you can't let yourself be beat because of lack of effort.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: My heroes are and were my parents. I can't see having anyone else as my heroes.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: I've always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Limits, like fear, is often an illusion.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: There is no 'i' in team but there is in win.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: I want to be the bridge to the next generation.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: We all fly. Once you leave the ground, you fly. Some people fly longer than others.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: It's a heavy duty to try to do everything and please everybody. My job was to go out there and play the game of basketball as best I can and provide entertainment for everyone who wanted to watch basketball. Obviously, people may not agree with that; again, I can't live with what everyone's impression of what I should or what I shouldn't do.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: In reality, I never want to grow up.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: The game is my wife. It demands loyalty and responsibility, and it gives me back fulfillment and peace.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: My body could stand the crutches but my mind couldn't stand the sideline.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Winning isn't always championships.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: Sometimes, things may not go your way, but the effort should be there every single night.
values.author: Michael Jordan

values.authorQuote: My trade and art is to live.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Stubborn and ardent clinging to one's opinion is the best proof of stupidity.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Lend yourself to others, but give yourself to yourself.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The value of life lies not in the length of days, but in the use we make of them... Whether you find satisfaction in life depends not on your tale of years, but on your will.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Nothing fixes a thing so intensely in the memory as the wish to forget it.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Marriage is like a cage; one sees the birds outside desperate to get in, and those inside equally desperate to get out.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Age imprints more wrinkles in the mind than it does on the face.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Ignorance is the softest pillow on which a man can rest his head.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Nothing is so firmly believed as what we least know.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: My life has been full of terrible misfortunes most of which never happened.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The soul which has no fixed purpose in life is lost; to be everywhere, is to be nowhere.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: It is not death, it is dying that alarms me.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: A wise man sees as much as he ought, not as much as he can.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: I do myself a greater injury in lying than I do him of whom I tell a lie.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Those who have compared our life to a dream were right... we were sleeping wake, and waking sleep.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: The finest souls are those that have the most variety and suppleness.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: I know well what I am fleeing from but not what I am in search of.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: If you don't know how to die, don't worry; Nature will tell you what to do on the spot, fully and adequately. She will do this job perfectly for you; don't bother your head about it.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: I care not so much what I am to others as what I am to myself. I will be rich by myself, and not by borrowing.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: I speak the truth not so much as I would, but as much as I dare, and I dare a little more as I grow older.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: There are some defeats more triumphant than victories.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: It is a monstrous thing that I will say, but I will say it all the same: I find in many things more restraint and order in my morals than in my opinions, and my lust less depraved than my reason.
values.author: Michel de Montaigne
values.authorBirthplace: Château de Montaigne, Guyenne, Kingdom of France

values.authorQuote: Every block of stone has a statue inside it and it is the task of the sculptor to discover it.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: My soul can find no staircase to Heaven unless it be through Earth's loveliness.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: The marble not yet carved can hold the form of every thought the greatest artist has.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: A man paints with his brains and not with his hands.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: If people knew how hard I worked to get my mastery, it wouldn't seem so wonderful at all.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: I live and love in God's peculiar light.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: The promises of this world are, for the most part, vain phantoms; and to confide in one's self, and become something of worth and value is the best and safest course.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Genius is eternal patience.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: I am still learning.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: It is well with me only when I have a chisel in my hand.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Good painting is the kind that looks like sculpture.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: The best of artists has no conception that the marble alone does not contain within itself.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: The more the marbles wastes, the more the statue grows.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: There is no greater harm than that of time wasted.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Death and love are the two wings that bear the good man to heaven.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: From such a gentle thing, from such a fountain of all delight, my every pain is born.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Even if you are divine, you don't disdain male consorts.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Every beauty which is seen here by persons of perception resembles more than anything else that celestial source from which we all are come.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: The best artist has that thought alone Which is contained within the marble shell; The sculptor's hand can only break the spell To free the figures slumbering in the stone.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: Carving is easy, you just go down to the skin and stop.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: A beautiful thing never gives so much pain as does failing to hear and see it.
values.author: Michelangelo
values.authorBirthplace: Caprese near Arezzo, Republic of Florence

values.authorQuote: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: We learned about honesty and integrity - that the truth matters... that you don't take shortcuts or play by your own set of rules... and success doesn't count unless you earn it fair and square.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: You should never view your challenges as a disadvantage. Instead, it's important for you to understand that your experience facing and overcoming adversity is actually one of your biggest advantages.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: You have to stay in school. You have to. You have to go to college. You have to get your degree. Because that's the one thing people can't take away from you is your education. And it is worth the investment.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: We learned about gratitude and humility - that so many people had a hand in our success, from the teachers who inspired us to the janitors who kept our school clean... and we were taught to value everyone's contribution and treat everyone with respect.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Just try new things. Don't be afraid. Step out of your comfort zones and soar, all right?
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: I am an example of what is possible when girls from the very beginning of their lives are loved and nurtured by people around them. I was surrounded by extraordinary women in my life who taught me about quiet strength and dignity.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: I have learned that as long as I hold fast to my beliefs and values - and follow my own moral compass - then the only expectations I need to live up to are my own.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: If my future were determined just by my performance on a standardized test, I wouldn't be here. I guarantee you that.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: One of the lessons that I grew up with was to always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals. And so when I hear about negative and false attacks, I really don't invest any energy in them, because I know who I am.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: At the end of the day, when it comes time to make that decision, as president, all you have to guide you are your values, and your vision, and the life experiences that make you who you are.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Let's be very clear: Strong men - men who are truly role models - don't need to put down women to make themselves feel powerful. People who are truly strong lift others up. People who are truly powerful bring others together.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Public education is our greatest pathway to opportunity in America. So we need to invest in and strengthen our public universities today, and for generations to come.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: The fact is, with every friendship you make, and every bond of trust you establish, you are shaping the image of America projected to the rest of the world. That is so important. So when you study abroad, you're actually helping to make America stronger.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: There are still many causes worth sacrificing for, so much history yet to be made.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Sometimes, it's just easier to say yes to that extra snack or dessert, because frankly, it is exhausting to keep saying no. It's exhausting to plead with our kids to eat just one more bite of vegetables.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: We can make a commitment to promote vegetables and fruits and whole grains on every part of every menu. We can make portion sizes smaller and emphasize quality over quantity. And we can help create a culture - imagine this - where our kids ask for healthy options instead of resisting them.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Choose people who lift you up.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Here in America, we don't let our differences tear us apart. Not here. Because we know that our greatness comes from when we appreciate each other's strengths, when we learn from each other, when we lean on each other, because in this country, it's never been each person for themselves. No, we're all in this together. We always have been.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Women in particular need to keep an eye on their physical and mental health, because if we're scurrying to and from appointments and errands, we don't have a lot of time to take care of ourselves. We need to do a better job of putting ourselves higher on our own 'to do' list.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: Barack knows the American Dream because he's lived it, and he wants everyone in this country to have that same opportunity, no matter who we are or where we're from or what we look like or who we love.
values.author: Michelle Obama
values.authorOccupation: layer, writer, First Lady of the United States

values.authorQuote: You don't have to be somebody different to be important. You're important in your own right.

values.authorQuote: I'm substantially concerned about the policy directions of the space agency. We have a situation in the U.S. where the White House and Congress are at odds over what the future direction should be. They're sort of playing a game and NASA is the shuttlecock that they're hitting back and forth.
values.author: Neil Armstrong
values.authorOccupation: Astronaut, engineer, first person to walk on the Moon

values.authorQuote: I put up my thumb and it blotted out the planet Earth.
values.author: Neil Armstrong
values.authorOccupation: Astronaut, engineer, first person to walk on the Moon

values.authorQuote: I can honestly say - and it's a big surprise to me - that I have never had a dream about being on the moon.
values.author: Neil Armstrong
values.authorOccupation: Astronaut, engineer, first person to walk on the Moon

values.authorQuote: It suddenly struck me that that tiny pea, pretty and blue, was the Earth. I put up my thumb and shut one eye, and my thumb blotted out the planet Earth. I didn't feel like a giant. I felt very, very small.
values.author: Neil Armstrong
values.authorOccupation: Astronaut, engineer, first person to walk on the Moon

values.authorQuote: Once you have an innovation culture, even those who are not scientists or engineers - poets, actors, journalists - they, as communities, embrace the meaning of what it is to be scientifically literate. They embrace the concept of an innovation culture. They vote in ways that promote it. They don't fight science and they don't fight technology.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: There is no greater education than one that is self-driven.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Humans aren't as good as we should be in our capacity to empathize with feelings and thoughts of others, be they humans or other animals on Earth. So maybe part of our formal education should be training in empathy. Imagine how different the world would be if, in fact, that were 'reading, writing, arithmetic, empathy.'
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Even with all our technology and the inventions that make modern life so much easier than it once was, it takes just one big natural disaster to wipe all that away and remind us that, here on Earth, we're still at the mercy of nature.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: We are part of this universe; we are in this universe, but perhaps more important than both of those facts, is that the universe is in us.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: I don't care what town you're born in, what city, what country. If you're a child, you are curious about your environment. You're overturning rocks. You're plucking leaves off of trees and petals off of flowers, looking inside, and you're doing things that create disorder in the lives of the adults around you.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Everything we do, every thought we've ever had, is produced by the human brain. But exactly how it operates remains one of the biggest unsolved mysteries, and it seems the more we probe its secrets, the more surprises we find.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: I have a personal philosophy in life: If somebody else can do something that I'm doing, they should do it. And what I want to do is find things that would represent a unique contribution to the world - the contribution that only I, and my portfolio of talents, can make happen. Those are my priorities in life.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: I know of no time in human history where ignorance was better than knowledge.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Science literacy is the artery through which the solutions of tomorrow's problems flow.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Space exploration is a force of nature unto itself that no other force in society can rival.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Those who see the cosmic perspective as a depressing outlook, they really need to reassess how they think about the world. Because when I look up in the universe, I know I'm small but I'm also big. I'm big because I'm connected to the universe, and the universe is connected to me.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Rational thoughts never drive people's creativity the way emotions do.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: There is no science in this world like physics. Nothing comes close to the precision with which physics enables you to understand the world around you. It's the laws of physics that allow us to say exactly what time the sun is going to rise. What time the eclipse is going to begin. What time the eclipse is going to end.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: In the animal kingdom, one of the keys to survival is to outwit your enemies. And when you're surrounded by carnivores, one of the best strategies is to fade into the background and disappear.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: I don't know anybody who said, 'I love that teacher, he or she gave a really good homework set,' or 'Boy, that was the best class I ever took because those exams were awesome.' That's not what people want to talk about. It's not what influences people in one profession or another.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: I think that intelligence is such a narrow branch of the tree of life - this branch of primates we call humans. No other animal, by our definition, can be considered intelligent. So intelligence can't be all that important for survival, because there are so many animals that don't have what we call intelligence, and they're surviving just fine.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: I said that if an alien came to visit, I'd be embarrassed to tell them that we fight wars to pull fossil fuels out of the ground to run our transportation. They'd be like, 'What?'
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Our galaxy, the Milky Way, is one of 50 or 100 billion other galaxies in the universe. And with every step, every window that modern astrophysics has opened to our mind, the person who wants to feel like they're the center of everything ends up shrinking.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Everyone should have their mind blown once a day.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Perhaps we've never been visited by aliens because they have looked upon Earth and decided there's no sign of intelligent life.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: You can't have people making decisions about the future of the world who are scientifically illiterate. That's a recipe for disaster. And I don't mean just whether a politician is scientifically literate, but people who vote politicians into office.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: The only way you can invent tomorrow is if you break out of the enclosure that the school system has provided for you by the exams written by people who are trained in another generation.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: I've spent quality time in the aerospace community, with my service on two presidential commissions, but at heart, I'm an academic. Being an academic means I don't wield power over person, place or thing. I don't command armies; I don't lead labor unions. All I have is the power of thought.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: Ever since the Industrial Revolution, investments in science and technology have proved to be reliable engines of economic growth. If homegrown interest in those fields is not regenerated soon, the comfortable lifestyle to which Americans have become accustomed will draw to a rapid close.
values.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

values.authorQuote: The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes, then you are making new things, trying new things, learning, living, pushing yourself, changing yourself, changing your world. You're doing things you've never done before, and more importantly, you're doing something.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: Life is always going to be stranger than fiction, because fiction has to be convincing, and life doesn't.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: As a kid, I would get my parents to drop me off at my local library on their way to work during the summer holidays, and I would walk home at night. For several years, I read the children's library until I finished the children's library. Then I moved into the adult library and slowly worked my way through them.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: I believe that stories are incredibly important, possibly in ways we don't understand, in allowing us to make sense of our lives, in allowing us to escape our lives, in giving us empathy and in creating the world that we live in.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: Empathy is a tool for building people into groups, for allowing us to function as more than self-obsessed individuals.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: Write your story as it needs to be written. Write it honestly, and tell it as best you can. I'm not sure that there are any other rules. Not ones that matter.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: When I started out, there were a lot of things I knew I couldn't do, and a lot of things I only found out I couldn't do by going and doing it. And no-one was watching, and nobody cared.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: Things need not have happened to be true. Tales and adventures are the shadow truths that will endure when mere facts are dust and ashes and forgotten.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: I've known ambitious people with no aptitude for the thing they did. Most of whom, rather terrifyingly, tended to succeed.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: I wish being a beekeeper, which I am, gave you a free pass on the carbon footprint, but it doesn't.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: The only people I ever get irritated with are the ones who announce, using my Twitter handle, that they are no longer following me and why.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: The great thing about Batman and Superman, in truth, is that they are literally transcendent. They are better than most of the stories they are in.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: A nice, easy place for freedom of speech to be eroded is comics, because comics are a natural target whenever an election comes up.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor

values.authorQuote: I don't know if proud is the right word, but I am somebody who does not, on the whole, have the highest regard for my own stuff in that when I look all I get to see are the flaws.
values.author: Neil Gaiman
values.authorOccupation: Author, comic book creator, screenwriter, voice actor
